title: Egg

nouns: Animal reproductive body consisting of an ovum or embryo together with nutritive and protective envelopes; especially the thin-shelled reproductive body laid by e.g. female birds
An approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, snakes, insects and other animals, housing the embryo during its development.
An approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, snakes, insects and other animals housing the embryo during its development.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: An egg, displayed as a chicken egg with a white or light brown shell. Commonly used at Easter time. See also: üç≥ Cooking.
apple_vendor_description: The egg emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a pristine, smooth shell, rendered in a soft, creamy white with subtle pearlescent highlights that speak to Apple's signature realistic lighting. Its gentle, rounded form and subtle shading give it a delicate, almost fragile appearance, suggesting beginnings, potential, or a simple, wholesome subject. This cleanly designed emoji on Apple's platform is often used in contexts related to food, new life, or as a building block in creative communication.
